caption.p: ( a) Comparative cyclic voltammograms of PEDOT:PSS (+PEG) coated and CNT sheets wrapped cotton steel yarn electrodes obtained in a three-electrode system in 0.1 M PBS aqueous solution at a scan rate of 50 mV s −1. ( b) CV curves tested over different voltages from 0.8 to 1.4 V at a scan rate of 50 mV s −1. ( c) Galvanostatic charge-discharge curves obtained over different voltages from 0.8 to 1.4 V at a current density of 0.5 A g −1. ( d) CV curves of an optimized asymmetric supercapacitor at scan rates ranging from 10 to 1000 mV s −1.
